settings.heading: Local Delivery
settings.text: Need feed, fencing, or farming supplies fast? 53 Farm and Hardware in Ardmore, AL has you covered with our reliable local delivery service! Whether you're managing a large operation or tending a backyard garden, we’ll bring top-quality tools, feed, and hardware right to your gate. Save time and skip the hassle—just call in your order and let our team handle the rest. Proudly serving Ardmore and surrounding communities, 53 Farm and Hardware delivers convenience straight from our store to your door.

settings.heading: Paint Mixing
settings.text: At 53 Farm and Hardware in Ardmore, AL, we’re proud to offer one of the area’s most trusted and convenient paint mixing services—perfect for farmers, homeowners, and DIYers alike. Whether you're refreshing a barn, touching up your tractor, or adding a splash of color to your home, our expert staff can mix any shade you need with precision and speed. With high-quality paint brands and custom color matching, we’ll make sure you leave with the perfect hue every time. Stop by 53 Farm and Hardware—where quality, service, and local know-how come together!

settings.heading: Key Cutting
settings.text: Need a spare key fast? Stop by 53 Farm and Hardware in Ardmore, AL for quick, reliable key cutting services you can count on. Whether it's for your home, barn, shed, or tractor, our trained staff uses precision equipment to ensure every cut is clean and accurate. Most keys are made while you wait, so you’ll be back to your day in no time. Trusted by locals for quality and convenience, 53 Farm and Hardware is your hometown stop for all things hardware—including your next perfect key.

settings.heading: Store Pickup
settings.text: Skip the wait and get back to what matters with store pickup from 53 Farm and Hardware in Ardmore, AL! Whether you're stocking up on feed, grabbing tools for your next project, or picking out supplies for the season, our convenient pickup service makes it easy. Simply shop online or give us a call, and we’ll have your order ready and waiting—just swing by and load up. Fast, local, and hassle-free, 53 Farm and Hardware is your hometown solution for getting what you need, when you need it.

settings.heading: Special Ordering
settings.text: Looking for something specific that’s not on the shelf? At 53 Farm and Hardware in Ardmore, AL, our popular special ordering service has you covered! Whether you're after hard-to-find tools, specialty feed, or unique farm equipment, we can help you get exactly what you need—on select items. Our friendly team is here to make sure you have access to top brands and quality gear without the hassle of searching all over. Stop by today and ask about special ordering—it’s fast, easy, and tailored just for you!

settings.heading: Gift Cards
settings.text: Looking for the perfect gift for the DIY enthusiast, gardener, or homesteader in your life? A 53 Farm and Hardware gift card is the ideal choice! Conveniently located in Ardmore, AL, 53 Farm and Hardware offers a wide selection of quality tools, farm supplies, home improvement essentials, and outdoor gear. Whether they're tackling a big project or just picking up the basics, your loved ones can shop local and get exactly what they need. Stop by today and grab a gift card that’s sure to please anyone who loves hard work and hometown values!

settings.heading: Bulk Delivery
settings.text: Looking for fast, reliable bulk delivery of landscaping materials in Ardmore, AL? Look no further than 53 Farm and Hardware! We proudly offer convenient delivery of rock, sand, mulch, and topsoil—perfect for farms, gardens, and outdoor projects of any size. Whether you're refreshing your flower beds, leveling ground, or starting a major construction job, our bulk materials are available at competitive prices and delivered straight to your property. Stop by 53 Farm and Hardware today or give us a call to schedule your bulk delivery—the local solution you can count on!
